Original: Refactoring to deepagents is the way Abhishek Katiyar @abhi__katiyar Was building infra for a gap I noticed in AI agent development. Original: LangSmith Astasia Myers @AstasiaMyers Great piece! Somethings that came to mind: Do we need new infra that is AI agent trace-native to support this use case?
